cab.content: 3Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.From Viceroy, Sth May 1917.Secret. Weekly report. Nortli-AVest Frontier quiet except for Mahsud situation to cope with which on defensive lines we are organising special field force. Afghanistan. Amir in letter of 26th April replying to mine of 24th January (see weekly letter, 2nd February), expresses satisfaction at assurances that military preparations on frontier are not intended for aggressive measures against tribes, and that road making in debateable territory had been prohibited. No change in the general military situation in India or Afghanistan.
